verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You set me apart
Gave me a new heart
Filled with compassion
To share Your great love
Show me Your ways
I want to know You
Guide me in truth
My hope is in You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
That I may dwell in Your house forever
Lifting up Your Name
Dwell in Your house forevermore

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'll hold on to You
My strength and my refuge
Whom shall I fear
I know You are near
All of my days
I live for You Lord
Establish my path
There's one thing I ask

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit have Your way
Sweet anointing teach our hearts
Our lives we pray
